# btp_globalaccount_identity_provider (Data Source)

Gets details about a specific available identity provider for a global account.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "btp_globalaccount_identity_provider" "single_global_idp" {
  host = "<host>"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `host` (String) The host of the identity provider.

### Read-Only

- `common_host` (String) The common host of the identity provider.
- `cost_center_id` (Number) The cost center ID associated with the entity.
- `custom_host` (String) The custom host of the identity provider.
- `customer_id` (String) The customer ID.
- `customer_name` (String) The name of the customer.
- `data_center_id` (String) The data center ID.
- `description` (String) The description of the identity provider.
- `display_name` (String) The display name of the identity provider.
- `region` (String) The region where the identity provider is located.
- `status` (String) The current status of the identity provider.
- `tenant_id` (String) The unique ID of the tenant.
- `tenant_type` (String) The type of the tenant.
